<h1 align="center">Darknet Portal üòà </h1>

Darknet-Portal is a cyberpunk-inspired hacker terminal site that lets you dive into the world of digital exploration and security breaches. Packed with powerful tools like a Crypto Miner, Password Cracker, Neural Network simulations, Surveillance systems, Compilers, Terminal commands, Camera access, and even Satellite controls, this platform delivers an immersive experience for tech enthusiasts. Designed to mimic the thrill of breaching security protocols in a futuristic setting, Darknet-Portal is the perfect playground for anyone looking to explore the boundaries of technology in style.

## Key Features üéØ
- üöÄ **Cyberpunk Aesthetic:** Dive into a neon-lit, hacker-inspired interface straight out of a futuristic dystopia.
- üíª **Tech Arsenal:** Harness cutting-edge tools like Crypto Miners, Password Crackers, and Neural Network simulators.
- üé• **Surveillance Mastery:** Control and monitor systems with advanced camera and tracking features.
- üõ∞Ô∏è **Satellite Domination:** Command virtual satellites for a unique, tech-driven experience.
- üîê **Digital Intrusion Simulations:** Experience the adrenaline of safe and controlled security protocol breaches.
- ‚öôÔ∏è **Dynamic Terminal Commands:** Experiment with compilers and execute real-time terminal operations.
- üåê **Boundless Exploration:** Unlock the thrill of pushing technological limits in an immersive, gamified environment.

## Technologies Used üë®üèª‚Äçüíª
- **TypeScript** ‚Äì A statically typed superset of JavaScript that enhances code reliability and maintainability.  
- **TailwindCSS** ‚Äì A utility-first CSS framework for creating stunning, responsive designs effortlessly.  
- **Docker** ‚Äì A containerization platform enabling seamless deployment, scalability, and efficient application management.  

## Installation üõ†Ô∏è
- First Read this [License](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/Darknet-Portal/blob/main/LICENSE) & their terms then proceed.
- Star the [Repository](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/Darknet-Portal) - Mandatory Step.
- Clone the repository:
```bash
  git clone https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/Darknet-Portal.git
```
- Navigate to root directory:
```bash
  cd Darknet-Portal
```
- Install the necessary dependencies in this directory:
```bash
  pnpm install
```
- Contact with Me For Neccesaary Credential, if wanted to Start the Server [Contact](https://github.com/UjjwalSaini07/Darknet-Portal/issues)

## Usage üñ•Ô∏è

- Start the development server
```bash
   pnpm run dev
 ```
- Open your browser and navigate to http://localhost:8080 to view the localhost website
